## MinValueNumberValidatorDirective class

Directive injecting checking for number min value validator

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class MinValueNumberValidatorDirective implements Validator, OnChanges 
```
<b>Implements:</b> Validator, OnChanges
